proposed_skills.name: communication-calibrator
proposed_skills.why_now: Style adaptation is now explicitly requested; make it measurable.
proposed_skills.v1: Score replies for directness, clarity, and unnecessary filler.

proposed_skills.name: lesson-distiller
proposed_skills.why_now: Persistent learning benefits from automatic lesson extraction.
proposed_skills.v1: Convert daily logs into 3-5 durable lessons with confidence tags.

proposed_skills.name: skill-suggester
proposed_skills.why_now: Many repeated ops scripts can be bundled into reusable skills.
proposed_skills.v1: Detect repetitive workflows and emit draft skill specs.
